ygData.subject: efrium
ygData.msgSnippet: ok, this isn t a bash on anyone, but ready this guys posts just makes me laugh, he appears to have all this knowledge about tinkering and the pets then the
ygData.messageBody:
ok, this isn't a bash on anyone, but ready this guys posts just makes me
laugh, he appears to have all this knowledge about tinkering and the pets
then the next post he says "charmed the executioner cuz he had an axe" ? i
dont' think so, first of all you can't charm if you have a pet/animation, or
ppl could make multiple animations, and secondly the ghoul exec has no
animation for when he holds the axe. so you couldn't possible have seen
it...

you just lost all your credibility man

Daey Faroth
50th Necro
Xegony
